resources.string: Opsionele lang beskrywing van die uitsending. %1$s is beskikbaar. Lengte moet minder as %2$s karakters.

string.name: sourceSingleUrl
string.comment:
An input box. The user can add the external URL the PGN playback of the game is coming from, to set up their event broadcast.
Could be alternatively stated as "Source URL for the PGN".

resources.string: URL wat Lichess sal nagaan vir PGN opdaterings. Dit moet openbaar beskikbaar wees vanaf die Internet.
Optioneel, indien jy weet wanner die geleentheid begin
Skrap die rondte en sy spelle beslis uit.
Skrap alle spelle van hierdie rondte. Die bron sal aktief moet wees om hulle te kan herskep.
Vee beslis die hele toernooi uit, met al sy rondtes en spelle.
Opsioneel: vervang spelername, graderings en titels

string.name: unrated
string.comment: Please do not translate simply as "casual". "Unrated" here refers to tournaments that are organised outside of Lichess. The rating in question will usually align to a FIDE federation.
